snippet.title: Hatsune Miku Bomb Squad - New Game Boy Color Release!
snippet.description:
Play on the web at https://mksf-birdup.itch.io/hatsune-miku-bomb-squad or download the GBC ROM to take Miku with you wherever you go!

Hatsune Miku is a virtual pop idol, a racing team mascot, a snow festival spokeswoman, a boxing instructor... you name it, she's an expert. Now a member of the top secret Munitions Intervention Knowledge Unit (M.I.K.U.) she's ready to teach you the finer points of bomb defusal. 

Test yourself against 25 challenging puzzles while enjoying a bundle of chiptune Hatsune Miku song covers in this puzzle game exclusively for the Game Boy Color!

Hatsune Miku Bomb Squad was built from the ground up in GB Studio in July 2024 by @mksf_birdup.
